name: Ball Maze (Eliodor)
description:
This is not a ready game. This is a simple project to demonstrate the implemented mechanic. Rotating the plane when you press the key. The motion of the ball along the plane. In the version for Android the board is static, and the ball is moving by the gyro. Implemented a system of bonuses, which can be selected in the process of the game. Reduces HP when touched by a wall or trap.

For mobile phone  download APK
